_header: Gods great goodness and His long abiding
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, love to sinners; grace; penitence
_description: On the punishment for sin and reward for amendment granted by God and Christ — two couplets in a Latin sermon

CamGon334.Transcription:
godes grete godnysse & hys longe abydyngeCristes open exemple
                    & hys holy techyngeHard dom ordayned for oure punyschementAnd gret
                    mede y schape for oure amendement
CamGon334.Editions:
Owst,  Gerald Robert. 
             Preaching in Medieval England.
         Cambridge: UP, 1926; rev. ed. New York, 1961: 273 n..
